text: (nabiyē!) apagē dharmayan labā dun ayagen, kavurun eya samudīraṇaya kaḷa yutu ākārayaṭa samudīraṇaya kara, (dæna) gena (anugamanaya) karannōda, ovun (śuddha vū kurānaya vana) meyada (anivāryayenma) viśvāsa karannāha. namut (ovungen) kavurun hō meya pratikṣēpa kaḷahot ovun niyata vaśayenma parājitayinma vannāha
